entry.title: IMPRS BB Virtual Selection Symposium 2025
entry.content:
We are looking forward to the IMPRS BB Virtual Selection Symposium 2025, taking place on January 27–28, 2026.

Preparation for the two-day IMPRS selection symposium is underway. We received the updated schedule, candidate list, guide, and evaluation materials for both days.

The interviews are scheduled for Tuesday and Wednesday, January 27–28, 2026, with applicant assessments handled through Open Campus.

Program website: IMPRS Brain and Behavior

entry.title: Invited Keynote at Bernstein Center Freiburg Retreat

link.title: Invited Keynote at Bernstein Center Freiburg Retreat

entry.content:
I am looking forward to an invited keynote at the Bernstein Center Freiburg retreat on October 8-10, focused on High-dimensional population activity: data acquisition and analysis, at Kloster Lichtenthal (Baden-Baden).

Many thanks to Christian and colleagues for the invitation. The retreat format will provide an excellent setting for focused discussion across data acquisition and analysis approaches in systems neuroscience.
